name: FAnimationRecordingSettings
doc: Settings describing how to record an animation

bRecordInWorldSpace: Whether to record animation in world space, defaults to true
bRemoveRootAnimation: Whether to remove the root bone transform from the animation
bAutoSaveAsset: Whether to auto-save asset when recording is completed. Defaults to false
SampleFrameRate: Sample rate of the recorded animation
Length: Maximum length of the animation recorded (in seconds). If zero the animation will keep on recording until stopped.
Interpolation: This defines how values between keys are calculated for transforms.*
InterpMode: Interpolation mode for the recorded keys.
TangentMode: Tangent mode for the recorded keys.
bRecordTransforms: Whether or not to record transforms
bRecordMorphTargets: Whether or not to record morph targets
bRecordAttributeCurves: Whether or not to record parameter curves
bRecordMaterialCurves: Whether or not to record material curves
bTransactRecording: Whether or not to transact recording changes
IncludeAnimationNames: Include only the animation bones/curves that match this list
ExcludeAnimationNames: Exclude all animation bones/curves that match this list
